category.name: Subscription Manager
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_notification_mode
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether the failure of Workflow background process notification is delivered via SMTP email or Active Workspace alert or both. Note: Active Workspace client must be installed Valid Values: *1 : Delivered as SMTP email. This is the default value. *2 : Delivered in the user's Active Workspace alerts. *3 : Delivered in both.
